title: If It Ain't Broke Don't Fix It
itunes:title: If It Ain't Broke Don't Fix It
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 52 year old married woman and I’ve been married for 21 years and we have 3 teenagers at home. I’m working from home now, so I’m able to cook for the kids and be a bit more hands on. I also have more time to see how ignorant my husband really is. He is a cheater and a very bad one. He’s been busted several times and I’ve overlooked it because I don’t want to break up a happy home....................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
